Unlimited Incentives For $99 Monthly - No Contracts - 30 Day Risk Free Trial 1-800-619-6101 (Toll-Free) Home Our Incentives Samples How It Works Testimonials FAQ Contact Sign Up Other Services 30 Day Risk-Free Trial Terms&Conditions
Our incentive marketing program works and we are willing to prove that it works at no risk to our new customers.
Our incentives work but there is participation required by our customers; you must run incentive marketing campaigns within your business to receive your desired results.
Therefore to participate and to receive the refund you must use our service in the first 30 days from your membership sign up date. To qualify for the 30 day risk free trial refund you need to have at least one (1) paid redemption in the first 30 days of your membership. Redeeming a“Free Healthcare Discount Card“does not satisfy your requirement because it is not a“paid redemption.”
If you are not completely satisfied with the redemption and or the fulfillment process within the first 30 days we will refund 100% of your membership fees per your request.
By signing up with our company you understand and acknowledge that in order to qualify you must have at least one (1) paid redemption within the first 30 days of your membership.
You are also required to cancel within 30 days by submitting a 'Support Ticket' from your 'Main Control Panel' account in order to qualify for the refund. Failure in completing these steps will terminate any members' ability to receive the 30-Day Risk Free Trial refund.
$300 Restaurant Certificate Go Back To All Of Our Incentives
Details Available Restaurants RETAIL VALUE: $300.00 (12 - $25 restaurant certificates)
THE BOTTOM LINE TO YOUR CUSTOMERS:
This incentive offers your customers a $25 Restaurant Certificate every month for the next 12 months for a grand total of $300 worth of Restaurant Certificates that can be redeem at any of our 18,000 participating restaurants nationwide. In addition your customers will also have access to an unlimited amount of the latest and greatest fast food and restaurant coupons that they can use to receive discounts at their favorite food spots. Your customers pay a $29.95 processing fee to redeem. Go to www.FunDiningRewards.com to view a list of our participating restaurants.
THE ULTIMATE MARKETING INCENTIVE:
This incentive is so powerful because the $25 Restaurant Certificate that your customer receives every month is branded with your logo and company information keeping your company brand top of mind for the next 12 months.
EASY REDEMPTION:
1. You give your customer the restaurant certificate.
2. Your customers are instructed to register their certificate online at www.FunRewardsForYou.com
3. They will receive a $25 restaurant certificate every 30 days for the next 12 months.
4. Your customer enjoys receiving their complimentary $25 Restaurant Certificate every month and explains to their friends and family about the business who gave them the certificate.
Unlimited printing and emailing of certificates: As a member you can print and email an unlimited amount of these certificates with no per certificate costs to you.
No Redemption Fee Option: As a member you can eliminate the $29.95 redemption fee by purchasing this certificate as a"Premium Certificate". Your cost to print a"Premium Certificate"starts at 21.95 each with no minimum purchase requirement.
